post:
Specially for our beloved forum users!

Everybody likes to hear warm words about love, but we have decided that words won’t be enough to express our feelings, so we would like to give you 14% discount for shared hosting and VPS with promocode “14-VALENTINE” on Valentine's Day - 14 February!


For a little $3.8* monthly fee you get:

  • Free domain in on of the .com, .net, .org, .info, biz, .org zones
  • Free SSL certificate to protect your website
  • 10 GB Storage space on Super fast SSD disks
  • Powerful website builder for free


*Calculations are based on the Shared hosting Basic tariff plan.
Do you still have any questions? You can ping us in the live chat on the website or send an email to: sales@unihost.com
